DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of two regimens (Sevorane/LMA ctr. Propofol/Remifentanil) for children undergoing MRI in general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Regimens of Anesthesia for Children Undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) in General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: children aged 1 to 10 yrs. ASA 12 Allergy to soya (propofol) Allergy to Pentobarbital Allergy to Remifentanil Allergy to Sevoflurane Children undergoing blood tests or further examinations in conjunction with the MRI Children with unexplained fever Children which are evaluated not to be able to keep a open airway
